title: No option to transfer servers in 'account' next to 'purchase rp'
body:
Hi,

I have enough RP for a transfer and want to transfer my account from NA to EUW.

however, all I see is 'summoner name change' in 'account' next to 'purchase rp' in the client.

how do I transfer servers?

thanks

replies.body: Hey there, indeed, transfers are disabled until Novermber 7 as we ramp up end of season rewards.  We gave players a notice about a month ago, but hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see if we can make an exception here or refund.  I can't make any guarantees, but it would be worth a try!
its now January and i still don't have the option to transfer servers? whats going on?
Me too mate, it is so frustrating. I really want to transfer to EUNE but icons just don't appear.
server transfers have been shut down until the end of season they won't be back in the store till the 20th of November i believe
Would love an update on this as account transfers are still not available. My friend is coming over from OCE on vacation for 3 weeks and she wants to move her account.
when will the transfers be back from now ?!
where did they inform us about this? I bought rp specifically for this and unless it was explicit somewhere I want a refund
